verses.verse: שִׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> Hear דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> ye children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because רִ֤יב <S%H7379><s%> hath a controversy לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> against יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> with the inhabitants הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> Because אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> there אֱמֶ֧ת <S%H571><s%> because [there is] no truth וְֽאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> is no חֶ֛סֶד <S%H2617><s%> nor mercy וְאֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> there דַּ֥עַת <S%H1847><s%> nor knowledge אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land

אָלֹ֣ה <S%H422><s%> By swearing וְכַחֵ֔שׁ <S%H3584><s%> and lying וְרָצֹ֥חַ <S%H7523><s%> and killing וְגָנֹ֖ב <S%H1589><s%> and stealing וְנָאֹ֑ף <S%H5003><s%> and committing adultery פָּרָ֕צוּ <S%H6555><s%> they break out וְדָמִ֥ים <S%H1818><s%> and blood בְּדָמִ֖ים <S%H1818><s%> blood נָגָֽעוּ׃ <S%H5060><s%> toucheth

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֣ן ׀ <S%H3651><s%> after that תֶּאֱבַ֣ל <S%H56><s%> mourn הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> Therefore shall the land וְאֻמְלַל֙ <S%H535><s%> therein shall languish כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and everyone יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <S%H3427><s%> and every one that dwelleth בָּ֔הּ בְּחַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> with the beasts הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> of the field וּבְע֣וֹף <S%H5775><s%> and with the fowls הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also דְּגֵ֥י <S%H1709><s%> yea the fishes הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea יֵאָסֵֽפוּ׃ <S%H622><s%> also shall be taken away

אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> Yet אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> Yet let no man אַל־ <S%H408><s%> no יָרֵ֖ב <S%H7378><s%> strive וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> no יוֹכַ֣ח <S%H3198><s%> nor reprove אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> another וְעַמְּךָ֖ <S%H5971><s%> for thy people כִּמְרִיבֵ֥י <S%H7378><s%> [are] as they that strive כֹהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> with the priest

וְכָשַׁלְתָּ֣ <S%H3782><s%> Therefore shalt thou fall הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in the day וְכָשַׁ֧ל <S%H3782><s%> also shall fall גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also נָבִ֛יא <S%H5030><s%> and the prophet עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> by לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> with thee in the night וְדָמִ֖יתִי <S%H1820><s%> and I will destroy אִמֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H517><s%> thy mother

נִדְמ֥וּ <S%H1820><s%> are destroyed עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> My people מִבְּלִ֣י <S%H1097><s%> corruption הַדָּ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> for lack of knowledge כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אַתָּ֞ה <S%H859><s%> you הַדַּ֣עַת <S%H1847><s%> knowledge מָאַ֗סְתָּ <S%H3988><s%> because thou hast rejected וְאֶמְאָֽסְאךָ֙ <S%H3988><s%> I will also reject מִכַּהֵ֣ן <S%H3547><s%> thee that thou shalt be no priest לִ֔י וַתִּשְׁכַּח֙ <S%H7911><s%> to me seeing thou hast forgotten תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> the law אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> of thy God אֶשְׁכַּ֥ח <S%H7911><s%> I will also forget בָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> thy children גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I

כְּרֻבָּ֖ם <S%H7235><s%> abundance כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> the more חָֽטְאוּ־ <S%H2398><s%> so they sinned לִ֑י כְּבוֹדָ֖ם <S%H3519><s%> their glory בְּקָל֥וֹן <S%H7036><s%> into shame אָמִֽיר׃ <S%H4171><s%> against me [therefore] will I change

חַטַּ֥את <S%H2403><s%> the sin עַמִּ֖י <S%H5971><s%> of my people יֹאכֵ֑לוּ <S%H398><s%> They eat up וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward עֲוֹנָ֖ם <S%H5771><s%> on their iniquity יִשְׂא֥וּ <S%H5375><s%> and they set נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H5315><s%> their heart

וְהָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will be like כָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And there shall be like people כַּכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> like priest וּפָקַדְתִּ֤י <S%H6485><s%> and I will punish עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> for דְּרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> them for their ways וּמַעֲלָלָ֖יו <S%H4611><s%> them their doings אָשִׁ֥יב <S%H7725><s%> and reward לֽוֹ׃

וְאָֽכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> For they shall eat וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׂבָּ֔עוּ <S%H7646><s%> and not have enough הִזְנ֖וּ <S%H2181><s%> they shall commit whoredom וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִפְרֹ֑צוּ <S%H6555><s%> and shall not increase כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD עָזְב֖וּ <S%H5800><s%> because they have left off לִשְׁמֹֽר׃ <S%H8104><s%> to take heed
זְנ֛וּת <S%H2184><s%> Whoredom וְיַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> and wine וְתִיר֖וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and new wine יִֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> take away לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> the heart

עַמִּי֙ <S%H5971><s%> My people בְּעֵצ֣וֹ <S%H6086><s%> counsel at their stocks יִשְׁאָ֔ל <S%H7592><s%> ask וּמַקְל֖וֹ <S%H4731><s%> and their staff יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> declareth ל֑וֹ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> unto them for the spirit זְנוּנִים֙ <S%H2183><s%> of whoredoms הִתְעָ֔ה <S%H8582><s%> hath caused [them] to err וַיִּזְנ֖וּ <S%H2181><s%> and they have gone a whoring מִתַּ֥חַת <S%H8478><s%> Thahash אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> from under their God

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> upon the tops הֶהָרִ֜ים <S%H2022><s%> of the mountains יְזַבֵּ֗חוּ <S%H2076><s%> They sacrifice וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגְּבָעוֹת֙ <S%H1389><s%> upon the hills יְקַטֵּ֔רוּ <S%H6999><s%> and burn incense תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Under אַלּ֧וֹן <S%H437><s%> under oaks וְלִבְנֶ֛ה <S%H3839><s%> and poplars וְאֵלָ֖ה <S%H424><s%> and elms כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Because ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> thereof [is] good צִלָּ֑הּ <S%H6738><s%> because the shadow עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> after that תִּזְנֶ֙ינָה֙ <S%H2181><s%> shall commit whoredom בְּנ֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1323><s%> therefore your daughters וְכַלּוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H3618><s%> and your spouses תְּנָאַֽפְנָה׃ <S%H5003><s%> shall commit adultery

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> without אֶפְק֨וֹד <S%H6485><s%> I will not punish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בְּנוֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1323><s%> your daughters כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when תִזְנֶ֗ינָה <S%H2181><s%> when they commit whoredom וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Or כַּלּֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H3618><s%> nor your spouses כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when תְנָאַ֔פְנָה <S%H5003><s%> when they commit adultery כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> when הֵם֙ <S%H1992><s%> themselves עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַזֹּנ֣וֹת <S%H2181><s%> with whores יְפָרֵ֔דוּ <S%H6504><s%> for themselves are separated וְעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with הַקְּדֵשׁ֖וֹת <S%H6948><s%> with harlots יְזַבֵּ֑חוּ <S%H2076><s%> and they sacrifice וְעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> therefore the people לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> without יָבִ֖ין <S%H995><s%> [that] doth not understand יִלָּבֵֽט׃ <S%H3832><s%> shall fall

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though זֹנֶ֤ה <S%H2181><s%> play the harlot אַתָּה֙ <S%H859><s%> you יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Though thou Israel אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֶאְשַׁ֖ם <S%H816><s%> offend יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> [yet] let not Judah וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תָּבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> and come הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <S%H1537><s%> not ye unto Gilgal וְאַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> neither go ye up בֵּ֣ית אָ֔וֶן <S%H1007><s%> to Bethaven וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּשָּׁבְע֖וּ <S%H7650><s%> nor swear חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> Since כְּפָרָ֣ה <S%H6510><s%> heifer סֹֽרֵרָ֔ה <S%H5637><s%> slideth back סָרַ֖ר <S%H5637><s%> as a backsliding יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> For Israel עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> now יִרְעֵ֣ם <S%H7462><s%> will feed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> now the LORD כְּכֶ֖בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> them as a lamb בַּמֶּרְחָֽב׃ <S%H4800><s%> in a large place
חֲב֧וּר <S%H2266><s%> [is] joined עֲצַבִּ֛ים <S%H6091><s%> to idols אֶפְרָ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> Ephraim הַֽנַּֽח־ <S%H3240><s%> let him alone לֽוֹ׃

סָ֖ר <S%H5493><s%> is sour סָבְאָ֑ם <S%H5435><s%> Their drink הַזְנֵ֣ה <S%H2181><s%> they have committed whoredom הִזְנ֔וּ <S%H2181><s%> continually אָהֲב֥וּ <S%H157><s%> do love הֵב֛וּ <S%H157><s%> love קָל֖וֹן <S%H7036><s%> [with] shame מָגִנֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H4043><s%> her rulers

צָרַ֥ר <S%H6887><s%> hath bound her up ר֛וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> The wind אוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> בִּכְנָפֶ֑יהָ <S%H3671><s%> in her wings וְיֵבֹ֖שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> and they shall be ashamed מִזִּבְחוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H2077><s%> because of their sacrifices ס
